mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rnum, a.* FROM( SELECT b.buser_seq, u.user_id, u.user_addr, u.user_email, b.buser_date, b.buser_end FROM bookflix_user b LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_user u ON b.user_seq = u.user_seq WHERE LOWER(u.user_id) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', #{user_id2}, '%')) ) a ) WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rnum, a.* FROM( SELECT b.buser_seq, rpad(substr(u.user_id, 1, 2), length(u.user_id), '*') as user_id, u.user_addr, u.user_email, u.user_email, b.buser_date, b.buser_end, u.domain FROM bookflix_user b JOIN tbl_user u ON b.user_seq = u.user_seq ) a ) WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( select rownum AS rnum, a.* FROM( SELECT f.review_seq, f.review_name, rpad(substr(t.user_id, 1, 2), length(t.user_id), '*') as user_id, f.review_date, f.review_score, f.review_contents FROM bf_review f LEFT OUTER JOIN bookflix_user b ON f.buser_seq = b.buser_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_user t ON b.user_seq = t.user_seq ORDER BY f.review_seq DESC )a )WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}
